https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1LC7DKzV3Q86hKkKqaK7w3YDULF.jpg A hot-shot lawyer is hired by a Hong Kong chemical plant to dispose of opposition to their polluting ways. But when he falls for a beautiful woman out to stop the plant, he is torn in a conflict of interest and asks his trusty friends Samo and Biao to help out at least until they discover the true purpose of the plant. Dragons Forever
